name: Hush 1199
description:
"Hush" [1] is variation on the "Heartbleed" series [2] I released last year. The background texture is generated from a turmite [3] with custom rules I implemented in C++, and the heart shaped overlays are generated using the ambient [4] package in R.

Sources:

[1] https://art.djnavarro.net/gallery/hush/
[2] https://art.djnavarro.net/gallery/heartbleed/
[3] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/turmite
[4] https://ambient.data-imaginist.com/

Author:
